action_title: Re-plant native trees in logged areas
key_messages:
Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects on butterflies and moths of replanting native trees in logged areas. The study was in Ghana.

COMMUNITY RESPONSE (1 STUDY)

Richness/diversity (1 study): One site comparison study in GhanaÂ found that nine years after an area was replanted with native trees after logging it had similar species richness but lower diversity for two of three metrics compared to naturally regenerating secondary forest.
